help.title: Search
help.information: The XAMS-search helps you finding Sites, Domains, Users und Aliases by different search criterias.

section.head: Sitename
section.description: Name of the Site container. It must be a systemwide unique name, which is set by an administrator or a reseller. A reseller can manage this container and can delegate it to an Customer. the contingents of the site can only be managed by an administrator or a reseller.

section.head: Max. Quota in KB (each User)
section.description: The maximum size of a mailbox of a single user in the site. Emails bigger than the size-limit will not be saved. The sender will get an according error message. A Customer can set a lower size limit to his users, but the maximum is this setting.

section.head: Max. Users
section.description: This limits the number of Users a site is allowed to handle.

section.head: Max. Aliases
section.description: The same as "Max. Users", but it limits the number of aliases.

section.head: Domainname
section.description: Search-routine that filters by domainname (e.g. xams.org)

section.head: Username
section.description: Usually the email address of the user (the string he uses to login)

section.head: E-Mail Address
section.description: Enter the full email address using the complete syntax

section.head: Alias Ziel (Right Part)
section.description: Target address where the emails get redirected to if an alias was the actual address. if the target address is within the same site you can only set the local part (the string before the @ sign). else you should set the complete email address. You can also set multiple addresses delimited by a comma.
